contentTypeXml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<type>
  <name>my_type</name>
  <module>mymodule</module>
  <display-name />
  <content-display-name-script />
  <super-type>system:unstructured</super-type>
  <is-abstract>false</is-abstract>
  <is-final>false</is-final>
  <allow-children>true</allow-children>
  <form>
    <input type="TextLine" built-in="true" name="inputText1">
      <label>Line Text 1</label>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText />
      <helpText>Help text line 1</helpText>
      <occurrences minimum="1" maximum="1" />
    </input>
    <input type="TextLine" built-in="true" name="inputText2">
      <label>Line Text 2</label>
      <immutable>true</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText />
      <helpText>Help text line 2</helpText>
      <occurrences minimum="0" maximum="1" />
    </input>
    <input type="TextArea" built-in="true" name="textArea1">
      <label>Text Area</label>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <customText />
      <helpText>Help text area</helpText>
      <occurrences minimum="1" maximum="1" />
    </input>
  </form>
</type>
